name: The Wild Midwest
description:
Are you ready for a wild battle between tractors and mechs?

The Wild Midwest is an FPS/RTS hybrid game where you capture bases, build resources, and sabotage the enemy! Once the timer is up, hop into your mech for one final epic shooting match. Claim your land!

Features:

-Hybrid gameplay: Play in a traditional top-down for the beginning of the game! After 5 minutes, switch into Mech Mode, where you will be placed in an FPS!

-Capturable Bases: Capture different farmhouses to begin generating corn! 

-Upgrades: Spend your corn on upgrades to make your Mech stronger!

-Cannon Shot: Charge up your cannon on your tractor and shoot them down!

Credits:

Sam Brunes: Programmer/Other (VFX)

Ethan Clark: Sound Design/Programmer

Jake Gibson: Programmer

Joey Chamberland: 3D Artist/Environment

Kevin Aceituno Sanchez: Game UX Designer
